org.apache.flink.api.java.operators

Class SingleInputOperator<IN,OUT,O extends SingleInputOperator<IN,OUT,O>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<OUT>
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.operators.Operator<OUT,O>
        • org.apache.flink.api.java.operators.SingleInputOperator<IN,OUT,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    IN - The data type of the input data set.
    OUT - The data type of the returned data set.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AggregateOperator, DistinctOperator, IterativeDataSet, ProjectOperator, ScalaAggregateOperator, SingleInputUdfOperator

    public abstract class SingleInputOperator<IN,OUT,O extends SingleInputOperator<IN,OUT,O>>
extends Operator<OUT,O>
    Base class for operations that operates on a single input data set.

      • getInputType

        public TypeInformation<IN> getInputType()
        Gets the type information of the data type of the input data set. This method returns equivalent information as getInput().getType().
        Returns:
        The input data type.

      • translateToDataFlow

        protected abstract SingleInputOperator<?,OUT,?> translateToDataFlow(Operator<IN> input)
        Translates this operation to a data flow operator of the common data flow API.
        Parameters:
        input - The data flow operator that produces this operation's input data.
        Returns:
        The translated data flow operator.
